```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,message=FALSE,warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(cowplot)
```


## PCA without a bottleneck

```{r}
eig_nb <- read_tsv("data/hpc/fastsimcoal/no_bott/3.out.no_bott/pca/3.out.no_bott_1_1.eigenvec") %>% 
  extract("#IID",into="site",regex = "([^_]*)")

nb_p <- eig_nb %>% ggplot(aes(x=PC1,PC2)) + geom_point(aes(color=site))


eig_b <- read_tsv("data/hpc/fastsimcoal/growth_rate_SC/3.out.growth_rate_SC/pca/1_1.eigenvec") %>% 
  extract("#IID",into="site",regex = "([^_]*)")

n_p <- eig_b %>% ggplot(aes(x=PC1,PC2)) + geom_point(aes(color=site))


cowplot::plot_grid(nb_p,n_p)
```
